title: How do I install, manage, and uninstall applications?
answer:
On the home screen, touch Settings > Security and select Unknown sources. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110890) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110891)

 Download applications from HiSpace or Android Market and install them directly. 

 [Alternatively, touch File Manager, find and install downloaded applications.]()
